name: Crazy Robots (Earis-X)
description:
Crazy Robots  is a simple, 3D platformer, project for the Game Design & Development  specialization. 

Changes Overview - Level Design, Menu Aesthetics and Assets. 

Specific

Level 1 -  Three rooms with platforms and enemies

Level 2 -  A Factory 

For more details , please run the game and check the instructions. 
Feel free to leave a recommendation.
